titles.title: A resolution recognizing and celebrating the 145th anniversary of the entry of Nevada into the Union as the 36th State.
A resolution recognizing and celebrating the 145th anniversary of the entry of Nevada into the Union as the 36th State.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes and celebrates the 145th anniversary of the entry of Nevada into the Union as the 36th state.
